visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a scatter plot with the following specifications: The chart should have a title 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The axes should have labels styled with a font size of 12px and a color of #333333. The data series should include one series named 'Rainfall' with the provided data. The chart should have custom colors for the series, using shades of blue. Additional configurations should include a white background for the chart, a legend positioned at the bottom, and margins set to 50 pixels on all sides.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a scatter plot with specific styling and data. The chart type is set to 'scatter', and it includes a title 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The axes labels and titles are styled with a font size of 12px and a color of #333333. The data series includes one series named 'Rainfall' with the given data points. The series color is set to a shade of blue (#4f81bd). The chart background is white, and the legend is positioned at the bottom of the chart. Additionally, the chart has margins set to 50 pixels on all sides to ensure proper spacing around the chart area.
